actionCalls.description: This will send a quote request email using the information for the opportunity and contact information.
actionCalls.name: Quote_Request_Email_existing_contact
actionCalls.label: Quote Request Email (existing contact)

decisions.description: This decision allows the flow to determine where it needs to find information from the correct record (Lead/opp/contact). Once the right info has been found it can then be passed to the email notification.
decisions.name: Contract_decision_info_required
decisions.label: Contract decision info required

decisions.description: This decision allows the flow to determine where it needs to find information from the correct record (Lead/opp/contact). Once the right info has been found it can then be passed to the email notification.
decisions.name: Quote_decision_info_required
decisions.label: Quote decision info required

dynamicChoiceSets.description: For record type picklist which provides a choice of the objects record types
dynamicChoiceSets.name: RecordTypeChoice

recordCreates.description: This will create a record in the sales support object for a contract request.
recordCreates.name: Create_Contract_Request
recordCreates.label: Create Contract Request

recordCreates.description: This will create a record in the sales support object for a quote request.
recordCreates.name: Create_Quote_Request
recordCreates.label: Create Quote Request

recordLookups.description: Once the record has been created, we need to get some more information about the lead so that we can put that into the email alert
recordLookups.name: Get_Lead_Info
recordLookups.label: Get Lead Info

recordLookups.description: Find Salesforce records and stores their field values in a variable
recordLookups.name: Get_Lead_Records_for_Contract
recordLookups.label: Get Lead Records for Contract

recordLookups.description: Once the record has been created, we need to get some more information about the Opportunity so that we can put that into the email alert.
recordLookups.name: Get_Opportunity_Info
recordLookups.label: Get Opportunity Info

fields.name: Contract_Request_success
fields.fieldText: Contract Request sent

fields.name: error_message
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong with this flow.


Josh will receive an email about this error.


More details of the error can be found below:


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

textTemplates.name: Contract_Email_Body
textTemplates.text:
***New Contract to Send***


Quote ID: https://api.m12.net.uk/quotes/{!Get_Opportunity_Info.Quote_ID__c}


Opportunity: {!Opportunity_Lookup.recordName}

Account: {!Get_Opportunity_Info.Account_Name__c}

Contact: {!Contact_Lookup.recordName}

Lead: {!Lead_Lookup_Contract.recordName}


Products: {!Product_s_required_for_Contract}

Term: {!Contract_Term}

Notes: {!Contract_Notes}


﻿Bespoke Pricing

Bespoke Supplier Set up: {!Bespoke_Set_up_Cost}

Bespoke Supplier Rental: {!Bespoke_Supplier_Rental_Cost}

Suplier Quote Reference: {!Supplier_Quote_Reference}

textTemplates.name: Contract_Email_Body_LEAD_Info
textTemplates.text:
***New Contract to Send***


Quote ID: https://api.m12.net.uk/quotes/{!Get_Lead_Records_for_Contract.Quote_ID__c}

Lead Link: https://m12.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Lead/{!Lead_Lookup_Contract.recordId}/view



Account: {!Get_Lead_Records_for_Contract.Company}

Lead: {!Lead_Lookup_Contract.recordName}

Email: {!Get_Lead_Records_for_Contract.Email}


Products: {!Product_s_required_for_Contract}

Term: {!Contract_Term}

Notes: {!Contract_Notes}


Bespoke Pricing

Bespoke Supplier Set up: {!Bespoke_Set_up_Cost}

Bespoke Supplier Rental: {!Bespoke_Supplier_Rental_Cost}

Suplier Quote Reference: {!Supplier_Quote_Reference}

textTemplates.name: Quote_Email_Body
textTemplates.text:
***New Quotation to Send***


Quote ID: https://api.m12.net.uk/quotes/{!Get_Lead_Info.Quote_ID__c}

Lead Link: https://m12.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Lead/{!Lead_Lookup.recordId}/view



Company: {!Get_Lead_Info.Company}

Lead {!Lead_Lookup.recordName}

Email: {!Get_Lead_Info.Email}


Products: {!Product_s_to_Quote}

Term: {!Quote_Term}

Est Close Date: {!Est_Close_Date}

Notes: {!Quote_Notes}

textTemplates.description: This is the quote temple using information from existing contact/opportunity in salesforce. Typically used if more than one quote is being sent to the same opp.
textTemplates.name: Quote_Email_Body_OPP_CON_Info
textTemplates.text:
***New Quotation to Send***


Quote ID: https://api.m12.net.uk/quotes/{!Get_Opportunity_Records_for_Quote.Quote_ID__c}

Opportunity Link: https://m12.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Opportunity/{!Opportunity_lookup_Quote.recordId}/view



Company: {!Get_Opportunity_Records_for_Quote.Account_Name__c}

Contact: {!Contact_Lookup_Quote.recordName}


Products: {!Product_s_to_Quote}

Term: {!Quote_Term}

Est Close Date: {!Est_Close_Date}

Notes: {!Quote_Notes}
